nodes.text: Roksur was a male Human cyborg hired by Skavak to retrieve a piece of Nok Drayen's wealth from Zone Zero in Transport Station 5 on Taris. Roksur and his gang made it to the vault with great effort, but were apprehended by the future Voidhound and Corso Riggs. After a short holocall to Skavak, they were ordered to attack, but were all killed in the ensuing shoot-out.
